propositions.text: The document has a main section titled '1. 章节'.
The section '1. 章节' contains multiple sub-sections, each titled '序'.
These sub-sections are numbered sequentially from 1.1 to 1.752...

concepts.name: URL
concepts.context: A web address provided in the document.

concepts.name: 章节
concepts.context: A main section in the document, likely meaning 'chapters'.

concepts.name: 序
concepts.context: Repeated sub-sections within '章节', likely meaning 'preface' or 'introduction'.

hierarchy.structure: The document has a title, followed by a URL, and then a main section '章节' which is further divided into numerous sequential sub-sections labeled '序'.
